intent_atoms.description: Deliver a SwiftUI document shell that lets ISOInspectorApp open MP4/QuickTime files, stream them into the existing tree/detail UI, and persist a recent files list.
The app shell must host AppShellView with DocumentSessionController as entry point.
DocumentRecentsStore persists a recent files list.
When a document is active, the previous parsing explorer remains available (backward compatibility).
No changes to public Kit API.
AppShellView and DocumentSessionController are wired into SwiftUI app entry point.

functional_units.name: DocumentSessionController
functional_units.description: Manages opening and streaming MP4/QuickTime files into the existing tree/detail UI

functional_units.name: DocumentRecentsStore
functional_units.description: Persists a list of recently opened documents

functional_units.name: AppShellView
functional_units.description: SwiftUI view that hosts the document session controller and provides the app shell interface

functional_units.name: ISOInspectorApp wiring
functional_units.description: Application entry point that integrates AppShellView with the rest of the app
